title: The Walrus and the carpenter
creator_credit: MS&TG, Malcolm Spaull and Thomas Gasek
brief_description: An animated adaptation of Lewis Carroll’s whimsical poem in which the walrus and the carpenter entice a family of oysters to join them in their journey along the beach. Uses puppet animation. Narrated by Guy Spaull.
description: An animated adaptation of Lewis Carroll’s whimsical poem in which the walrus and the carpenter entice a family of oysters to join them in their journey along the beach. Uses puppet animation. Narrated by Guy Spaull.
